data.text:
It’s Not Christmas Till Somebody Cries available everywhere now! I hope it makes you smile and think of you and yours this season (as chaotic as they may be!)

https://t.co/0Z4voIQkq9 https://t.co/wm7nkuRE1i
“It’s Not Christmas Till Somebody Cries” official video is out now❤️ Happy Holidays! https://t.co/trgXmnWm53 https://t.co/PC0776t70w
Tried to keep it cool around the Christmas tree🎄😎 https://t.co/vS7eil3W5d
Secret is to sing a little song to survive... something special coming Wednesday!⛄️ https://t.co/aWZPATFZpH
So pumped to share my new Holiday merch line with you this year. Head over to my website to check it out! ❤️ https://t.co/4yKKx844oN https://t.co/uYhC1CFdc7
More Holiday fun coming your way soon! https://t.co/tZ0vTTmINq

Congrats on the new music video & doing things on your own, so impressed! 💜
directed by: maia
produced & edited by: maia
director of photography: maia https://t.co/DGcKWpNFz6

Feeling honored this song is being used to spread such an important message 💙 @Imrileycostello 

My US friends, please go to https://t.co/7KPlc3BTjG to make your voting plan. Manifesting BLUE! https://t.co/vlFeHeBjMd
@carlyraejepsen "Tried to keep it cool around the Christmas tree" https://t.co/vqmwZQ97V7
“I haven’t taken my Christmas lights down. They look so good on the Pumpkin.” -WS 🎃🎄👻 🎅 #itsnotchristmastillsomebodycries https://t.co/p0e7jc9ptI
It’s Not Christmas Till Somebody Cries - out everywhere Friday! https://t.co/Mt4YcjlsEj
Is it Christmas yet? Wrote a ditty about Xmas vs. reality. Should I release it? Let’s have a chat about that Mr. Frosty the Triangle Snowman. https://t.co/oc29gy1weY
Since today is game 1 of the @MLB World Series, I would like to offer my skills to the @Dodgers and the @RaysBaseball in case they need an extra pitcher. https://t.co/9rQSMtoUpN

Pop stars @carlyraejepsen and @mxmtoon go dig into the art of songwriting and live performance, their very different origin stories, and clutch career wisdom on the TALKHOUSE PODCAST https://t.co/DENPOTJYDw https://t.co/lgqW9aYzkt
.@ELLEmagazine #SongAssociation 💖 Watch the full video here: https://t.co/kTxxbhknyJ https://t.co/YZkApgw39h
aaaa ok on your own with @carlyraejepsen is on @bbcr1's best new pop!!! i’m a popstar https://t.co/y6BRgWAogi https://t.co/UyGNLjQVgF

Excited to be involved! Thank You @pitchfork 💛
https://t.co/s0ZnNRsp8h https://t.co/gdb2sqba4j
.@mxmtoon and @carlyraejepsen let their vulnerability show on the new track #okonyourown ❣️https://t.co/KphBoiylnm https://t.co/533bbi0qSh

So excited to share this collaboration with the lovely @mxmtoon! Hope you enjoy “ok on your own” - out everywhere now! 💫

https://t.co/JeadlKdjeM https://t.co/xkMaqwJJH8
Sounds like a dream to me! #okonyourown https://t.co/leMh3sBuun

E•MO•TION 🖤 *noun (\i-mō-shən\): a natural instinctive state of mind deriving from one's circumstances, mood, or relationships with others. ex: “She was attempting to control her emotions.” 🌈 @carlyraejepsen https://t.co/nYuHTZvVnB

5 years of @carlyraejepsen EMOTION in 5 minutes. As seen at the Anniversary Karaoke Party! Check it ouuuut ❤️ #ddfuego #carlyraejepsen
 https://t.co/9KRgOjeXXH

Today’s the day! The EMOTION Karaoke Party begins at 3pm PT/6pm ET/11pm UK/7am JST. 🎤✨ Hope to see yah there 💖

Link: https://t.co/imCUAMoXrb https://t.co/SpYrEi6QLD
That was so fun! Thanks for the wonderful questions, we'll have to do this again soon. See you on Thursday for our karaoke party 🎉 https://t.co/QjoFL2YL5d
Hi lovelies, I’m doing a Q&A right here on Twitter in one hour (2pm PT/5pm ET)! 💙 Come stop by and ask me your questions using #AskCarly

Been feeling so much love from you all for EMOTION this past week! Excited to celebrate at our Karaoke Party this Thursday 🥰 Sign up for a reminder to tune in and join me 🎤✨

https://t.co/5CvoUbn7Vx https://t.co/q7oIbEvsVX
Thanks @ClashMagazine! ❤️ https://t.co/YC5eoxBZBm
Thank you @RollingStone! 💕 https://t.co/4U3igIe2eh

Tom and I pretending to know how to dance is one of my fav memories of the entire EMOTION era. Check out this throwback of our behind the scenes for “I Really Like You”! PS @tomhanks you are still and forever my hero. 🕺🏆#5YearsOfEmotion 

Full vid here: https://t.co/rINRiTxQYf https://t.co/D0Dscz6pEP

Today marks #5YearsOfEmotion  ​🎉​​ It’s been such a joy to share so many beautiful memories from this record with you, can’t wait to celebrate with Thursday's Karaoke party.
 
Oh, & if you haven’t already, stream “Never Get to Hold You” & “Love Again” 😉

https://t.co/VQouRSXfz8 https://t.co/0nIrgCfeVb

More surprises! Very excited to share that “Never Get to Hold You” and “Love Again,” the Japan bonus tracks from EMOTION, are now available worldwide 💘 Listen here: https://t.co/VQouRSXfz8 https://t.co/fF4stXFuky
Ok ❤️ https://t.co/ZbVvW0WOvg

A different kind of love song... All this time off the road has me missing the band boys who have become like family.

Here’s something we cooked up from home- An ode to travel and adventures. Love from all of us...Me and the Boys in the Band. ❤️

https://t.co/L5Vka7ZIlz https://t.co/xwmpYBaUCK
Me and the Boys in the Band https://t.co/sxxzOsa5yG
